Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $1200000. This exclusive opportunity is designed to ensure you receive unparalleled value while also securing your satisfaction with our product. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information. We look forward to the possibility of serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
